components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
Bug description: KitchenSink crashes after running this item: KitchenSink->Platform->XHR->File Download->Set Web View (url)

Steps to reproduce:
 - launch KitchenSink
 - go to Platform->XHR->File Download
 - click Set Web View (url)

Expected behavior: it should download and show downloaded data

Actual behavior: it downloads and show downloaded data, then after 3-5 seconds crashes and restarts automatically

Reproducable on Emulator
fields.summary: Android: KitchenSink->Platform->XHR->File Download->Set Web View (url) craches
fields.environment:
CLI version 3.0.23, Titanium SDK version 3.0.2.v20130201161712
Google APIs Android 2.2 [armeabi]

comments.body:
Hello Roman,

Your report does not include logs, please review [Jira checklist|http://docs.appcelerator.com/titanium/latest/#!/guide/How_to_Submit_a_Bug_Report-section-29004732_HowtoSubmitaBugReport-JIRATicketChecklist] so this issue can be escalated, thanks.

h6.Tested on
Razr 2.3.5 --> non reproducible
